title: 服务器老是崩溃
author: djnnnnnnna
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-2-6 15:54 编辑 

崩溃报告
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Why is it breaking :(

Time: 2/6/16 4:15 PM
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: ChunkNibbleArrays should be 2048 bytes not: 0
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R1.NibbleArray.<init>(NibbleArray.java:14)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R1.ChunkRegionLoader.a(ChunkRegionLoader.java:352)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R1.ChunkRegionLoader.a(ChunkRegionLoader.java:97)
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R1.ChunkRegionLoader.loadChunk(ChunkRegionLoader.java:86)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R1.chunkio.ChunkIOProvider.callStage1(ChunkIOProvider.java:19)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R1.chunkio.ChunkIOProvider.callStage1(ChunkIOProvider.java:13)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_8_R1.util.AsynchronousExecutor$Task.init(AsynchronousExecutor.java:150)

        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

对不起，对配置这里我不太懂，我只能帮你缩小范围到配置这里（也可能不是，我真的不懂，我只是乐于助人而已，你最好发一下配置图，这样其他大神好帮你解决问题。当然，也可能是内存问题，试试把内存调成512，如果已经是了或者还不行那我也不知道了）
